summary: A disgraced Ranger takes command of an old, possibly haunted, ship on an escort mission that encounters deadly peril from a new enemy civilization.
cast: Dylan Neal|Andreas Katsulas|Alex Zahara|Myriam Sirois|Dean Marshall|Warren Takeuchi|Jennie Rebecca Hogan|Mackenzie Gray|David Storch|Enid-Raye Adams|Gus Lynch|Todd Sandomirsky|Andrew Kavadas|Simon Egan|Bernard Cuffling|Chris Robson|Rob Morton|Eric Schneider|Artine Tony Browne|Campbell Lane
keywords: outer space|trickery|traitor|evil aliens|reference to butch cassidy
title: Babylon 5: The Legend of the Rangers: To Live and Die in Starlight
